case_vignette: A 55-YEAR-OLD MALE WITH PAST MEDICAL HISTORY OF JEWISH ANCESTRY PRESENTS WITH PAINFUL ORAL LESIONS AND FEW "WATERBOILS" ON THE ARMS FOR THE PAST THREE MONTHS. HIS ONLY MEDICATIONS INCLUDE MULTIVITAMIN AND ATORVASTATIN WHICH HE HAS BEEN ON FOR THE PAST 15 YEARS WITHOUT ANY DOSAGE CHANGES. HE DENIES ANY RECENT TRAVEL OR GENITAL UCLERS. A FULL SKIN EXAMINATION IS REMARKABLE FOR IRREGULARLY SHAPED EROSIONS OF THE BUCCAL AND PALATINE MUCOSA AND SCATTERED FLACCID BULLAE ON THE ARMS WITH FEW SCATTERED CRUSTED EROSIONS. A BIOPSY OF A BULLA ON THE ARM IS PERFORMED AND DEMONSTRATES SUPRABASILAR ACANTHOLYSIS WITH VERTICALLY ORIENTED BASAL KERATINOCYTES WITH THE ACANTHOLYSIS INVOLVING HAIR FOLLICLES.
question: What is the final diagnosis?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Ask different questions to cover more information. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain, only give the diagnosis name. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized. You must give only 1 diagnosis otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I'm experiencing painful sores in my mouth and some blister-like lesions on my arms.
Have you noticed any other symptoms, such as fever or joint pain?
No, I have not noticed any symptoms like fever or joint pain.
Do the lesions itch or are they just painful?
The lesions are just painful, they do not itch.
How long have you had these symptoms?
I have had these symptoms for the past three months.
Are you currently taking any medications, or have you recently started taking new ones?
I am not on any new medications; I've been taking a multivitamin and atorvastatin for the past 15 years without any changes in dosage.
Do you have any known allergies, or have you had any similar issues in the past?
No, I don't have any known allergies, and I haven't had similar issues in the past.
Is there any family history of skin diseases or autoimmune disorders?
I don't have any information about family history of skin diseases or autoimmune disorders.
Final Diagnosis: Erythema Multiforme
